instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-3332: What is 820-3332? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.PPBUS_G3H: What is PPBUS_G3H? Main system power rail that charges the battery, or is power from the battery, that everything else is powered from. .
definitions.ISL5259: What is ISL5259? This is a typo of ISL6259.
definitions.ISL6259: What is ISL6259? This is a charging chip for Macbook motherboards from 2010 through 2015.
definitions.SMC_RESET_L: What is SMC_RESET_L? SMC_RESET_L puts the SMC into reset mode when it is low, _L means the signal is present when voltage is low. The SMC being in reset mode keeps it from running..

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3332</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> - <SIGNAL>PPBUS_G3H</SIGNAL> low
threads.message:
The Board is pretty clean.
All the rails is there, however, the <SIGNAL>PPBUS_G3H</SIGNAL> is around 12.13V To low and don't detects the battery.
Any hint?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3332</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> - <SIGNAL>PPBUS_G3H</SIGNAL> low
threads.message:
Post exact voltage and dioe mode to ground on SCL/SDA lines of battery bus.
Also check resistance between pins 17/18 and 27/28 of <CHIP>ISL5259</CHIP>.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3332</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> - <SIGNAL>PPBUS_G3H</SIGNAL> low
threads.message: And inspect for corrosion near the SMC

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3332</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> - <SIGNAL>PPBUS_G3H</SIGNAL> low
threads.message:
[USER="682"]2informaticos[/USER] 17/18 = 4.3 (supposed to be around 4)
                                27/28 = 21.7 (was supposed to be around 20)  

[USER="1153"]JohnB8812[/USER]     SMC is pretty clean. I tested pins 10-11 ISL to SMC and is fine.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3332</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> - <SIGNAL>PPBUS_G3H</SIGNAL> low
threads.message: 12.13 is too low regardless. <SIGNAL>SMC_RESET_L</SIGNAL> voltage? If 3.3, then likely bad <CHIP>ISL6259</CHIP> or bad SMC. If low, figure out why.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3332</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> - <SIGNAL>PPBUS_G3H</SIGNAL> low
threads.message:
"Post exact voltage and dioe mode to ground on SCL/SDA lines of battery bus."
???
You are loosing time...
